scriptmodule.description: Validates all prices on product grid fit into price range.

command.name: assertXpathCount
command.target: //span[contains(@class,'product-sales-price') and ((number(substring-after(text(), '$'))>=@{lowerBoundary} and number(substring-after(text(), '$'))<=@{upperBoundary}) or (number(substring-after(text(), '- $'))>=@{lowerBoundary} and number(substring-after(text(), '- $'))<=@{upperBoundary})) != true()]
command.comment: 1. Lowest price must fit into price range OR 2. Highest price must fit into price range 3. If there is a product having a price outside these conditions -> xpath count will be greater than 0 which leads to a failed assert
